result.html: A dhaoine uaisleLadies and gentlemen!
result.ponchtml: A ḋaoine uaisleLadies and gentlemen!

result.eng: I was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ḋaoine sa ḃialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.

result.ga: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.orig: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.html: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ḋaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.

result.eng: But it's nice to meet new people, too.
result.ga: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisin
result.orig: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisin
result.html: Ach tá sé go deas casadh ar dhaoine nua freisinBut it's nice to meet new people, too.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá sé go deas casaḋ ar ḋaoine nua freisinBut it's nice to meet new people, too.

result.eng: It's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ga: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.orig: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.html: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladhIt's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an ṁaise do ḋaoine a ḃeiṫ ag súil le molaḋIt's bad of people to expect praise.

result.eng: She was collecting information about various people.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.orig: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.html: Bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi ḋaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
